attributes.action: The BBC isn't an unbiased medium for the UK and shouldn't be publicly funded.
attributes.additional_details:
Particular reference should be made to two petitions that came out a day between them, one they give full worldwide coverage to and the other was ignored.

What was it?

The Trump for and against petitions regarding his proposed State visit.
attributes.background: The BBC no longer is a medium for unbiased journalism, it quite clearly operates on the Left and as such should not be publicly funded. We are being dictated to through this Channel and to have a compulsory payment to service their agenda is little short of a national disgrace.

rejection.details: This petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179823
